title: Google Now for Android ICS Installer (M7_Offline)
description:
Google Now for Android ICS Installer (M7_Offline)


Install with recovery and reboot

Voice Search and Locations and other Cards work great

"Talk back" function working on most phones

This Installer will install both the(Blue)Google Search which starts the Google Now App and the (Blue)Voice Icon that will open the Speak Now Red Mike Option

(You can delete any GoogleQuickSearchBox.apk or Velvet.apk or GoogleTTS.apk's on your phone first for best results but it is not a must)

It was hard to find a working install for ICS...

Tested on Sony Experia U running a rooted stock ROM .10/.54/.100

Should work on any phone stuck on ICS



Thanks to everyone at XDA



eye_share

:)
